mapper.select:
SELECT ig.*,
,
,
FROM t_case_assign ig LEFT JOIN t_flow_main fm ON ig.`assign_id`=fm.`approve_item_id` AND fm.`approve_item_type`='t_case_assign' LEFT JOIN t_flow_log fl ON fm.`approve_item_id`=fl.`approve_item_id` AND fm.`flow_id`=fl.`flow_id` LEFT JOIN t_flow_log flo ON fl.`flow_id`=flo.`flow_pid` AND fl.`activity_inst_id`=flo.`act_pid` WHERE ig.`assign_id`= #{assignId} ORDER BY fl.`modify_time`
SELECT ig.*,fm.* FROM t_case_assign ig LEFT JOIN t_flow_main fm ON ig.`assign_id`=fm.`approve_item_id` AND fm.`approve_item_type`='t_case_assign' WHERE ig.`assign_id`= #{assignId}
